Name: 3 Days in the Abyss
About the game: This version of the Game is in Beta Testing Mode, any issues or feedback then report to the Discord Server: About: On Friday afternoon, the Saviour's Spirit descended into the fires of the Abyss for 3 Days to rescue the Captives, from Adam and Eve to John the Baptist. His Journey and fight is to bring them back into Paradise, in order to take away the powers and control of the Evil One and overcome the temptations. Gameplay: The Player is the spirit of the Saviour that is set in a maze of finding the Captives locked inside cells that must be unlocked and collected to activate the escape key to advance to the next level. There are enemies that will get harder as the Player advances through the levels. The whole game is followed by Cut scenes telling the Story as the Player goes on. There are some random pickups that will aid the Player.
